title: Google\Cloud\NetworkSecurity\V1beta1\AuthorizationPolicy\Rule\Source
name: Source
description:
Specification of traffic source attributes.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networksecurity.v1beta1.AuthorizationPolicy.Rule.Source

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.principals
params.description: Optional. List of peer identities to match for authorization. At least one principal should match. Each peer can be an exact match, or a prefix match (example, "namespace/*") or a suffix match (example, // /service-account") or a presence match "".

params.name: data.ip_blocks
params.description: Optional. List of CIDR ranges to match based on source IP address. At least one IP block should match. Single IP (e.g., "1.2.3.4") and CIDR (e.g., "1.2.3.0/24") are supported.
